pages.text: $(l:plants/dead_tree#tree_larva)Larvae$() discovered during your journeys through the swamps possess intriguing magical properties. $(br)It became evident that they would find use in potion brewing, but another problem arose â€“ extracted from the bark of $(l:plants/dead_tree)Dead Trees$(), these creatures perish very quickly. The solution to this problem was found rather swiftly.

pages.title: The Solution
pages.text: By applying knowledge of making fermented spider eyes, a preservative formula for these creatures was devised. Sealing a fresh larva tightly in a $(l:odour_extracting/empty_vial)glass vial$() with a mixture of $(l:components/salt)salt$() and sugar can preserve its magical properties for a long time.
